mapper.select: SELECT ITSD.CODE_NO AS handle_code, ITSD2.CODE_NO AS tool_code, BM.MAT_CODE AS mat_code, BM.MAT_NAME AS mat_name FROM INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD JOIN TOOL_COMBINED TC ON TC.MAIN_TOOL_ID = ITSD.ID AND TC.IS_SPLIT = 0 JOIN TOOL_COMBINED_DETAILED TCD ON TCD.PID = TC.ID AND TCD.IS_SPLIT = 0 JOIN INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD2 ON ITSD2.ID = TCD.AUX_TOOL_ID JOIN BASE_MATERIAL BM ON BM.ID = ITSD2.MAT_ID order by ITSD.CODE_NO
